attributes.action: Reduce the cost of fuel by 10p in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see the goverment reduce the cost of fuel by 10p, this would also include diesel.
By cutting the cost by just 10p both the public and the goverment would be much happier. Also i would like to see fuel stations in the UK capped to a max level of which they can sell their fuel.
